Different Crime.Crime Name: Failure to comply with the Proceeds of Crime (Money Laundering) and Terrorist Financing Act
legal_basis: Proceeds of Crime (Money Laundering) and Terrorist Financing Act
procedural_fairness: penalty calculation used an undisclosed formula not aligned with statutory criteria
reasonableness_of_decision: penalty unreasonable due to lack of transparency in its calculation
decision_outcome: Appeal partially allowed; matter returned to FINTRAC for re-determination of penalties
compliance_with_regulations: Kabul Farms failed to meet regulatory requirements

Different Crime.Crime Name: Failure to develop and apply written compliance policies and procedures
legal_basis: Proceeds of Crime (Money Laundering) and Terrorist Financing Act
result_of_case: matter returned for reconsideration of penalties
